summary: Project to restore an ecommerce store experience: show previously uploaded products and allow visitors/users to purchase using existing Stripe setup; also delete a specific first UI element.
architectural_notes: Use existing Stripe integration/settings already configured for payments.
known_issues: Store is currently not showing previously uploaded products and/or purchase flow via Stripe is not working; needs restoration.

existing_features.title: Delete the first selected element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]) from the Store page UI by removing the corresponding StorePage header/banner section so it no longer renders.

Ensure the existing Stripe setup remains usable after upgrades by persisting the Stripe configuration across canister upgrades so visitors/users can complete Stripe checkout from the cart using the already-configured Stripe settings.

new_feature_requests.summary: Delete the first selected UI element from the page (remove from underlying code).
Restore store to display previously uploaded products/items.
Enable purchasing from the store using the existing Stripe payment setup (incl. cart/checkout flow).
Restore the store so it displays the products/items that were previously uploaded by making product storage survive canister upgrades (i.e., store product data must persist across redeploy/upgrade).

projectName: Delete Store page header element and restore persistent store products + Stripe checkout
